author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Make a number of corrections to HGCal geometry by back porting #30323 #30413 #30425. The corrections are more relevant for partial wafers and is applicable to all HGCal geometries.

#### PR validation:

Tested using runTheMatrix.py. But for using V11 geometry one needs the backport of Jean-Baptiste's code

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backporting 3 PR's #30323, #30413 and #30425 which are integrated to master
title: Run4-hgx250 Backport the corrections to HGCal geometry most relevant for partial wafers from 3 PR's #30323 #30413 #30425
